name: LaunchPI
tagline: Launch Raspberry PI Java applications from within Eclipse
body:
### Welcome to LaunchPI
LaunchPI is an Eclipse plug-in that makes it possible to run and debug Java projects on your Raspberry PI directly from Eclipse

### Installation
* Of course you need Eclipse - [Kepler](http://www.eclipse.org/kepler/) or [Juno](http://www.eclipse.org/juno/). 
* To install the plug-in use this update site - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tsvetan-stoyanov/launchpi/master/org.launchpi.us/target/site/site.xml

### Usage in 3 easy steps
1. Choose a main class and add a new _Raspberry PI Run Configuration_ for it
2. Add a new Raspberry PI system
3. Run and enjoy
![Adding Raspberry PI Run Configuration](https://raw.github.com/tsvetan-stoyanov/launchpi/master/site/images/lpi.png)

### Feedback And Support
In case you want to share your opinion, found a bug, request a feature or contribute to the project please use the GitHub issues system - https://github.com/tsvetan-stoyanov/launchpi/issues
